comment: /**  * Get the value from the properties or use a fallback from the {@code defaults}.  * @param getter the getter for the properties  * @param fallback the fallback method, usually super interface method reference  * @param <V> the value type  * @return the property or fallback value  */
code: /**  * Get the value from the properties or use a fallback from the {@code defaults}.  * @param getter the getter for the properties  * @param fallback the fallback method, usually super interface method reference  * @param <V> the value type  * @return the property or fallback value  */ protected final <V> V get(Function<T, V> getter, Supplier<V> fallback) {     V value = getter.apply(this.properties).     return (value != null) ? value : fallback.get(). }
